name: Another Brain Circle Desert
description:
Another Brain Circle Desert Going in circles.

The whispering wind.
The ubiquitous sand.
The withered trees.
The vermilion sky.

Minimum system requirements:
-O.S.: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
-CPU: Pentium® III 800 MHz or higher
-Screen resolution: 800x600
-Free hdd space: 100mb
-Free ram space: 128mb
-GPU memory: 32mb
-DirectX®: DirectX® 8.0 or higher

I would really appreciate if you consider a donation tip when downloading this game.
Thank you.
